summary: Contoso Wireless offers a streaming service that allows customers to stream music and videos directly from the service. It is available on any device that supports the Contoso Wireless app, including smartphones, tablets, and computers. The streaming service is included with all Contoso Wireless plans and there are no limits to how much you can stream. Customers should use the latest version of the app and have a good internet connection in order to get the best performance from the streaming service. If customers have any issues with the streaming service, they can contact Contoso Wireless customer support for assistance.
